attributes.action: STOP SYRIAS CHEMICALS COMING TO ELLESMERE PORT
attributes.additional_details:
We dont want the chemicals from Syria coming to Ellesmere port to be destroyed, we where never consulted about the chemicals here nor have we been given any consideration over the publics worry over the pollutions it may cause to our future families as well as the present.
We want the process stopped until the Government explain to us the people of Ellesmere Port about the dangers and to take a vote over the issue of it coming here, as i know most wont want it we have enough pollutions here to cope with...
